pages.title: Physical Piston
pages.text: Overview $(br2)Controls two physics structures to maintain position/velocity.
Interaction $(br2)$(li)Sneak + Right Click to assemble blocks above (glue not supported).$(li)Use a wrench to adjust orientation.

pages.title: Main Panel
pages.text: Right Click with an empty hand to open the control panel.
Main Panel $(br2)Displays:$(br2)Current: Position/velocity (blocks/blocks per second).$(br2)Locked: Whether constrained.$(br2)Target: Desired position/velocity.
Main Panel $(br2)Mode: Position or Velocity.$(br2)Cheat: NO_REPULSE disables reaction force (gravity is disabled by default).
Main Panel $(br2)AutoLock: Locks when:$(li)Velocity mode: Target is 0.$(li)Position mode: Error < 1e-3.
Redstone Panel $(br2)Configurable parameters: Output force, Target value, Lock status. See general redstone panel documentation.
PID Panel $(br2)Output force formula: (P*error + D*error_rate + I*error_integral) * mass + gravity component.$(br)Do not adjust if unfamiliar.
